trans-unit.source: Represents a binary secret security token.
trans-unit.target: 表示二進位秘密安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A byte-array that represents the key.
trans-unit.target: 表示金鑰的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to call the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼說明如何呼叫建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The key size in bits.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰的大小 (以位元為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The token ID.
trans-unit.target: 權杖識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A byte-array that represents the key.
trans-unit.target: 表示金鑰的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The token ID.
trans-unit.target: 權杖識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The key size in bits.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰的大小 (以位元為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> is less than or equal to zero, or it is greater than or equal to 512, or it is not a multiple of 8.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> 小於或等於零，或者大於或等於 512，或者不是 8 的倍數。

trans-unit.source: The token ID.
trans-unit.target: 權杖識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A byte-array that represents the key.
trans-unit.target: 表示金鑰的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether to allow cryptography.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否允許密碼編譯的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The token ID.
trans-unit.target: 權杖識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The key size in bits.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰的大小 (以位元為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether to allow cryptography.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否允許密碼編譯的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.BinarySecretSecurityToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> is less than or equal to zero, or it is greater than or equal to 512, or it is not a multiple of 8.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> 小於或等於零，或者大於或等於 512，或者不是 8 的倍數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bytes that represent the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示金鑰的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The key.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token ID.
trans-unit.target: 取得權杖識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The token ID.
trans-unit.target: 權杖識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token key size.
trans-unit.target: 取得權杖金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: The token key size.
trans-unit.target: 權杖金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of security keys.
trans-unit.target: 取得安全性金鑰的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />s.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token effective start time.
trans-unit.target: 取得權杖的有效開始時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the token effective start time.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示權杖的有效開始時間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token effective start time.
trans-unit.target: 取得權杖的有效開始時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the token effective start time.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示權杖的有效開始時間。
